subject: Fines (Penalties)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chicago Bulls center Joakim Noah was fined $15,000 by the N.B.A. for yelling at the officials after he was ejected from a game at Sacramento.
snippet: Chicago Bulls center Joakim Noah was fined $15,000 by the N.B.A. for yelling at the officials after he was ejected from a game at Sacramento.
